进行政治活动；谈论政治

bilingual.target: 她同时保持对政治的关注。

bilingual.source: His political ardour led him into many arguments
bilingual.target: 他对政治的热情使他多次投入争论。

bilingual.source: Like those concerning moral and political issues.
bilingual.target: 比如那些关注于道德和政治的问题。

bilingual.source: His political ardour led him into many arguments.
bilingual.target: 他对政治的热情使他多次投入争论.

bilingual.source: But the political posturing and trade-union bluster signifies little.
bilingual.target: 但是，政治的态度与工会的喧闹并不能说明什么。

bilingual.source: This paper thinks that the change of modern social life territory-wide makes the political culture of toleration possible not only in the political inner logic but also political practice logic.
bilingual.target: 文章认为，现代社会生活境域的转变，使政治宽容的文化生成不仅在政治的内在逻辑上是可能的，而且在政治的实践逻辑上也是可能的。

bilingual.source: The problem of state power is a key to the political issues.
bilingual.target: 国家权力问题是政治的核心问题.

bilingual.source: By contrast, social and political tensions might be a bigger worry.
bilingual.target: 相比之下，社会和政治的紧张局势可能更令人担忧。

bilingual.source: We must allow no political germs to eat into our healthy organisms.
bilingual.target: 我们决不让任何政治的微生物侵蚀我们的健全的肌体.

bilingual.source: The cause of flight of capital is the unstable political situation.
bilingual.target: 资本外逃是因为政治的不稳定.

list.abstract: political，英 [pəˈlɪtɪkl]，美 [pəˈlɪtɪkl]。英文单词，形容词。指的是政治的；国家的；政府的。短语搭配为“political commentary（政治评论）”。例句为“Later, he decided to do political (政治的) work.（后来，他决定从事政治工作）”。 political近义词为governmental。反义词为nonpolitical。

yingyinNormal.en: They're using both as political levers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们把这两个都当做政治杠杆。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing here? I'm a political refugee.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么在这儿？来这儿政治避难。

yingyinNormal.en: Stop serving political interests and convict criminals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不再趋从政治利益，将罪犯绳之以法。

yingyinNormal.en: We can change that with this new book. I'm not a political tool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以用这本新书来扭转局面。我可不是政治工具。

yingyinNormal.en: I know what this story is. Political sabotage, plain and simple.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道这是怎么回事，政治陷害，就这么简单。

yingyinNormal.en: But you have political instincts. And you're a brand. You're St. Alicia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你有政治直觉，你有品牌效应，你是圣人艾丽西娅。

yingyinNormal.en: Our nation was recovering from a political scandal and a trade crisis with China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我国正在从一起政治丑闻和与中国的贸易危机中走出来。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't use national security matters for political purposes. You know that, Adam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会把国家安全与政治竞争混为一谈，你知道的，亚当。

yingyinNormal.en: It is the nation's cultural, political and financial center and an economic powerhouse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它是中国的，文化、政治和金融中心，是一个经济重镇。

yingyinNormal.en: We polled every political name against Castro. And she's the only one who won. Handedly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们调查了每一个可能的人选，只有她能够打败卡斯特罗，轻而易举地打败他。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd like to say, for the record, that I think this interview is an act of political sabotage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要郑重声明我认为这次面谈是一场政治阴谋。

yingyinNormal.en: And I can work with the political team, coordinate with House leg directors, chiefs of staff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能配合政治团队协调，国会立法主任和幕僚长。

yingyinNormal.en: I see a political operative who has a very inflated sense of his own worth. Go to hell, Peter!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只看到个过度高估自身价值的政客。去你妈的，彼得！

yingyinNormal.en: You used me. You wanted the pardons for your own political gain. You're a disgrace to the cause.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你利用我，为了你自己的政治利益，你想得到那特赦，你是我们组织的耻辱。

yingyinNormal.en: The president has strong electoral and other political incentives to act in the public interest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由于选举压力和其他政治因素，总统采取行动得考虑公众利益。

yingyinNormal.en: I would not presume to educate you on the wiles of political men, comely or otherwise, Chancellor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论如何，我可不敢冒昧教您如何做一个智谋多端的政客，宰相大人。

yingyinNormal.en: I told the congresswoman that enlisting her political machinery in Dallas is a crucial first step.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我跟议员女士说，用上她在达拉斯的政治力量是很关键的第一步。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not about convincing. It's about being honest about the political climate that we find ourselves…
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是说不说服的事，而是我们得看清当下的政治气候，我们现在的处境。

yingyinNormal.en: The Democratic Senate will not be inclined to remove a Democratic president. But they need political cover.
yingyinNormal.zh: 民主党掌权的参议院不会弹劾民主党总统。但他们需要政治掩护。

yingyinNormal.en: Raymond's not a politician. He relies on our political expertise as much as we rely on his business acumen.
yingyinNormal.zh: Raymond不是政客。他依赖我们的政治意见，正如我们依靠他的商业头脑。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 政治上；政治地；政党地
adj. 政治的；国家的；政府的；国事的；政治上的；政党的；党派的；对政治感兴趣的；取决于地位的；非原则的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 社会和政治；社会政治；社会及政治

sense_info_list.en: relating to the government or the way government is carried on

examination_example.sentence: Avoiding this rather than promoting it should unite the left and right of the <highlight>political</highlight> spectrum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 避免这种情况而不是提倡这种情况，应该把政治光谱中的左派和右派团结起来。

examination_example.sentence: That framework has contributed mightily to our broken immigration system and the long <highlight>political</highlight> paralysis over how to fix it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一框架极大地促进了我们破碎的移民系统和对如何解决这一问题的长期政治瘫痪。

examination_example.sentence: Constitutional law is <highlight>political</highlight> because it results from choices rooted in fundamental social concepts like liberty and property.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宪法之所以是政治性的，是因为它源于植根于自由和财产等基本社会概念的选择。

examination_example.sentence: Beethoven was a deeply <highlight>political</highlight> man in the broadest sense of the word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在最广泛的意义上，贝多芬是一个深具政治色彩的人。

word_usage.usage: political常常带有“政党利益”、“带政治偏见”的贬义，如：political trial 政治审判

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>

adj. 政治的；国家的；政府的；国事的；政治上的；政党的；党派的；对政治感兴趣的；取决于地位的；非原则的

examination_example.sentence: Later, <highlight>political</highlight> strategists adopted the terms to influence public opinion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来，政治战略家采用这些术语来影响舆论。

examination_example.sentence: This is similar to what's happening in the coal and oil industries, a situation that fuels much of the current <highlight>political</highlight> discontent in this country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这类似于煤炭和石油行业中发生的情况，这种情况加剧了该国当前的许多政治不满情绪。

examination_example.sentence: Failing states are of international concern because they are a source of terrorists, drugs, weapons and refugees, threatening <highlight>political</highlight> stability everywhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没落的国家受到国际关注，因为它们是恐怖分子、毒品、武器和难民的来源，威胁各地的政治稳定。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 政治的；国家的；政府的；国事的；政治上的；政党的；党派的；对政治感兴趣的；取决于地位的；非原则的

sense_info_list.en: relating to the government or the way government is carried on

examination_example.sentence: The very first Federal Duck Stamp was designed by J.N. “Ding” Darling, a <highlight>political</highlight> cartoonist .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最早的联邦鸭邮票是由政治漫画家J.N. “Ding” Darling设计的。

examination_example.sentence: Some were <highlight>political</highlight> in nature, criticizing the church and government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些是政治性的，批评教会和政府。

adj. 按时间顺序的；按先后顺序的；按时间计算的
adj. 持相反意见的；批评的；评论（性）的；有可能成为灾难的；危急的；临界的；关键性的；决定性的；附有详细深刻分析与评论的；病情严重的
adj. 生态的；生态学的
adj. 歇斯底里的；癔病的；极为有趣的

adj. 无意义的；荒谬的；愚蠢的

adj. 身体的；肉体的；物质的；有形的；实物的；体力的；物理学的；身体接触的；自然法则的；自然规律的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 政治的；国家的；政府的；国事的；政治上的；政党的；党派的；对政治感兴趣的；取决于地位的；非原则的

sense_info_list.en: relating to the government or the way government is carried on

examination_example.sentence: Later, he decided to do <highlight>political</highlight> (政治的) work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来，他决定从事政治工作。

examination_example.sentence: Ronald Reagan's love for <highlight>political</highlight> work led him to become President of the United States.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗纳德·里根对政治工作的热爱使他成为美国的总统。

examination_example.sentence: Linguists believed it helped a new country achieve unity (统一) and cultural independence at a time when most people cared about <highlight>political</highlight> freedom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语言学家认为，大多数人关心政治自由是助于一个新国家实现统一和文化独立。
